Articles.Content:
I was watching a video and it was showing two events simultaneously and it got me thinking- I'd like that for real. Having two versions of KSP, but from one .exe. So I can manage 2, or 3 things at once. Great for things like multi-craft missions or recovering used boasters SpaceX style.

So, takers?

(PS- I can't do this myself, so please do not suggest it).

The closest existing things are FMRS (which lets you do things like recover booster SpaceX-style, but one ship at a time) and Standalone Map View which runs two copies of KSP - one is used to control your ship and one just displays map view.
